# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (Mono Auto Generated)
mono_crash.*

# Team Foundation Server
$tf/

# Rekordbox
*.log

# VS Code directories
.vscode/

# Exclude the .vs directory
.vs/

# Exclude build directories
bin/
obj/

# Exclude ASP.NET temporary files
ClientBin/
__pycache__/

# Exclude database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Exclude directories and files for db migration
migrations/
dump.rdb

# Exclude node_modules folder
node_modules/

# Exclude the .vs directory
.vs
